verses.verse: Then He <S%H7725>brought<s%> me <S%H7725>back<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> which <S%H6437>faces<s%> the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and it was <S%H5462>shut.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall be <S%H5462>shut;<s%> it shall not be <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> by it, for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H935>entered<s%> by it; therefore it shall be <S%H5462>shut.<s%>

"As for the <S%H5387>prince,<s%> he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> in it as <S%H5387>prince<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> by <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out by the same <S%H1870>way.<s%>"

Then He <S%H935>brought<s%> me by <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>mark<s%> <S%H3820>well,<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H1696>say<s%> to you concerning <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2708>statutes<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and concerning <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H8451>laws;<s%> and <S%H7760>mark<s%> <S%H3820>well<s%> the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4161>exits<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H4805>ones,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H7227>"Enough<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

when you <S%H935>brought<s%> in <S%H1121>foreigners,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> to be in My <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to <S%H2490>profane<s%> it, [even] My <S%H1004>house,<s%> when you <S%H7126>offered<s%> My <S%H3899>food,<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood;<s%> for they <S%H6565>made<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6565>void<s%> – [this] in <S%H413>addition<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

"And you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H4931>charge<s%> of My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things<s%> yourselves, but you have <S%H7760>set<s%> [foreigners] to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4931>charge<s%> of My <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>"

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3605>"No<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1121>foreigner,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>foreigners<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

"But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7368>went<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from Me, when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8582>went<s%> <S%H8582>astray,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H8582>went<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> from Me <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

"Yet they shall be <S%H8334>ministers<s%> in My <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> having <S%H6486>oversight<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H1004>house;<s%> they shall <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to them.

<S%H3282>"Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to them <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4383>stumbling<s%> <S%H4383>block<s%> of <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have <S%H5375>sworn<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "that they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

"And they shall not <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to Me to <S%H3547>serve<s%> as a <S%H3547>priest<s%> to Me, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H3605>any<s%> of My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things,<s%> to the <S%H6944>things<s%> that are <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy;<s%> but they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H3639>shame<s%> and their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed.<s%>

"Yet I will <S%H5414>appoint<s%> them to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H5656>service,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> that shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> in it.

"But the <S%H3881>Levitical<s%> <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H4931>charge<s%> of My <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8582>went<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> from Me, shall <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to Me to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to Me; and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me to <S%H7126>offer<s%> Me the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"They shall <S%H935>enter<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> they shall <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to My <S%H7979>table<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to Me and <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4931>charge.<s%>

"And it shall be that when they <S%H935>enter<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> they shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments;<s%> and <S%H6785>wool<s%> shall not be on them while they are <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> and in the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H6593>"Linen<s%> <S%H6287>turbans<s%> shall be on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H4370>undergarments<s%> shall be on their <S%H4975>loins;<s%> they shall not <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with [anything which makes them] <S%H3154>sweat.<s%>

"And when they <S%H3318>go<s%> out into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> they shall <S%H6584>put<s%> <S%H6584>off<s%> their <S%H899>garments<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> they have been <S%H8334>ministering<s%> and <S%H5117>lay<s%> them in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers;<s%> then they shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> that they may not <S%H6942>transmit<s%> <S%H6942>holiness<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> with their <S%H899>garments.<s%>

"Also they shall not <S%H1548>shave<s%> their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> yet they shall not let their <S%H6545>locks<s%> <S%H7971>grow<s%> <S%H7971>long;<s%> they shall <S%H3697>only<s%> <S%H3697>trim<s%> [the hair of] their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>
<S%H3808>"Nor<s%> shall <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> when they <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

"And they shall not <S%H3947>marry<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%> or a <S%H1644>divorced<s%> woman but shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1330>virgins<s%> from the <S%H2233>offspring<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or a <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is the <S%H490>widow<s%> of a <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

"Moreover, they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> [the difference] <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and the <S%H2455>profane,<s%> and cause them to <S%H3045>discern<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

"And in a <S%H7379>dispute<s%> they shall <S%H5975>take<s%> their <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8199>judge;<s%> they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> it according to My <S%H4941>ordinances.<s%> They shall also <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H8451>laws<s%> and My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> My <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

"And they shall not <S%H935>go<s%> to a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H120>person<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> [themselves;] <S%H3588>however,<s%> <S%H518><s%> for father, for <S%H1>mother,<s%> for <S%H517>son,<s%> for <S%H1121>daughter,<s%> for <S%H1323>brother,<s%> or for a <S%H251>sister<s%> <S%H269>who<s%> has not <S%H834>had<s%> a <S%H1961>husband,<s%> they may <S%H376>defile<s%> themselves.
"And <S%H310>after<s%> he is <S%H2893>cleansed,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H5608>elapse<s%> for him.

"And on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H935>goes<s%> into the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"And it shall be with regard to an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for them, [that] I am their <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H272>possession<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> – I am their <S%H272>possession.<s%>

"They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and the <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H9172>devoted<s%> <S%H9172>thing<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H4480>theirs.<s%> <S%H1992><s%>

"And the <S%H7225>first<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> kind and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8641>contribution<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> kind, from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8641>contributions,<s%> shall be for the <S%H3548>priests;<s%> you shall also <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> to cause a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> on your <S%H1004>house.<s%>

"The <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> or <S%H929>beast<s%> that has <S%H5038>died<s%> a <S%H5038>natural<s%> <S%H5038>death<s%> or has been <S%H2966>torn<s%> to <S%H2966>pieces.<s%>
